mapper.select: SELECT summoner_id, queue_type, tier, rank, summoner_name, league_points, wins, losses, league_id FROM SUMMONER_SIMPLE_HISTORY WHERE summoner_id = #{summonerId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SUMMONER_SIMPLE_HISTORY(summoner_id, queue_type, tier, rank, summoner_name, league_points, wins, losses, league_id) VALUES (#{summonerId}, #{queueType}, #{tier}, #{rank}, #{summonerName}, #{leaguePoints}, #{wins}, #{losses}, #{leagueId})
